price: 105. Xaq baana (Qur’aanka) ku soo dejinnay, Xaq buuna ku soo degay27. Kuumana aanu soo dirin (Nabiyow) waxaan aheyn inaad ahaato bishaareeye iyo dige ahaan.
arabic: وَبِٱلۡحَقِّ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ وَبِٱلۡحَقِّ نَزَلَۗ وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا
footnotes: 27. Ma jiro Qur’aanka wax iska hor imaanaya, mana ku jiro wax ka weecasho ah Xaqa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wabil-ḥaqi anzalnāhu wabil-ḥaqi nazala wamā arsalnāka illā mubashiran wanadhīran
